titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning passes and sea-briefs, in pursuance of the treaties with Argiers [sic], Tunis and Tripoly.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at the court at Whitehall the twenty eighth day of January, in the seven and twentieth year of His Majesties reign. 1675/6.
Steele notation: Two therein to; Arms 84.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
